title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. [Please complete the steps to reproduce the bug]
OB: When trying to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead, and the item cannot be selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open the library outline view.2. Attempt to select any item for the first time.
